
## Script to create the list of y linked genes as ensembl IDs

```{r}

# gene names - hard coded
y.linked.gene.names <- c('EIF1AY', 'SMCY', 'ZFY', 'UTY', 'DDX3Y', 'USP9Y')

# load mapping from NCBI gene names to ensembl ID
y.linked.gene.mapping <- read.table(here("resources", "y_linked_genes.txt"), sep=",", header=T)

# filter genes list by selected gene names to give subset of ensembl IDs
y.linked.ensembl <- dplyr::filter(y.linked.gene.mapping,
                                    Gene.name %in% y.linked.gene.names)$Gene.stable.ID


# save list of ensembl IDs for use in sex test PCA in pipeline
write.table(pca_gene_signature, file = here("resources", "y_linked_ensemblID.txt"), col.names = F, row.names = F)


```
